post:
**LiteServer** is your partner for quality and affordable IT services. **LiteServer** was founded in 2007 and we are located in **The Netherlands**.  
We have years of experience in the IT market with providing a wide range of datacenter, network, colocation, dedicated and VPS services. We have our own racks, hardware and network equipment.  
On top of that we operate our network under the name “**AS60404**”.  
Our main focus is providing enterprise services for an affordable price. When you are looking for quality you are at the right place!  

Our VPS platform is build out of enterprise hardware and uses a RAID-10 **SSD** or **SSD Cached** storage array. No matter what VPS plan you order, you will always get excellent performance.  
We don't oversell our services, so performance is guaranteed 24/7.  

We have recently launched new VPS plans based on the **OpenVZ** and **KVM** virtualization technique. To celebrate this we have a **15% lifetime off** coupon active for anyone that orders a new VPS. Use coupon “ **VPS15OFF** “ during the order process, or click on one of the order links below to get 15% lifetime discount on your VPS! All our VPS plans that are in stock will be **instantly setup**.  
  
  
**Why LiteServer?**  
- We are no reseller. We have our own racks, equipment and network - one of the keys to provide a quality and reliable service.  
- We are in business since 2007 and provide rock solid services. You can trust us!  
- Premium network with quality IP transit and peering  
- Lightning fast VPS nodes  
- We don't oversell our VPS nodes, and guarantee performance at any time of the day  
- Instant setup  
- Friendly and professional support. Customers are not just a number at LiteServer!

**We offer 3 type of VPS plans:**  
**#SSD VPS Series:**  
These are our standard KVM/OpenVZ plans with **100% SSD storage**. The amount of memory, storage and bandwidth are all "balanced".  
  
**#Traffic VPS Series:**  
These KVM/OpenVZ VPS series are mainly designed for clients who use their VPS for **high bandwidth** purposes. For example, shoutcast streaming servers or private VPNs. The traffic VPS series have SSD-Cached based storage, and will come with a lower amount of storage than our SSD / Storage VPS plans. In exchange for the lower amount of storage, you'll get double the amount of monthly bandwidth. When you are looking for a lot of bandwidth, while storage is less important, the traffic VPS series are the ones you're looking for!  
  
**#Storage VPS Series:**  
Our storage series are ideal for people that require a **high amount of storage** (backups for example). These nodes have SSD Cached storage. Data that is frequently access will be stored on the cache SSDs, while the data which is less frequently accessed will run off the SATA drives. Average I/O performance will be close to that of our SSD plans, especially the data which is frequently being accessed.  
  
  
**Included with all VPS plans:**  
- Instant setup  
- 1Gbps shared uplink  
- 1 IPv4 address  
- /64 IPv6 subnet  
- SolusVM VPS control panel  
- Reverse DNS

**Frequently asked questions:**  
  
**Q: What Operating Systems are available?**  
We offer a wide range of Operating Systems. We have a knowledgebase article that lists all available Operating Systems:  
https://clients.liteserver.nl/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=1

**Q: Where can I found your AUP (Acceptable Usage Policy) and TOS (Terms of Service)?**  
**AUP:** https://www.liteserver.nl/en/acceptable-usage-policy/  
**TOS:** https://www.liteserver.nl/en/terms-of-service/  
  
**Q: What payment options are available?**  
You can pay with PayPal, Bank Transfer, Credit Card or Bitcoin.  
  
**Q: Are your prices including VAT?**  
All our prices are excluding VAT. If you live in Europe your local VAT tax rate will apply. Companies within the EU that can provide a valid VAT number will get a 0% VAT invoice after approval. Customers outside the EU don't have to pay any VAT.  
  
**Q: Is the included bandwidth being reset each month?**  
Yes! The bandwidth counter for your VPS will be reset on the first day of the month.  
  
**Q: Where is my VPS hosted?**  
Your VPS will be hosted in the center of The Netherlands. More details regarding our location can be found on our website.  
  
**Q: What is the difference between OpenVZ and KVM?**  
We have a knowledgebase article that describes the differences in detail:  
https://clients.liteserver.nl/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=13  
  
**Q: Are your VPSes unmanaged our managed?**  
All our VPSes mentioned are unmanaged, which means you need to take of the OS/software part. You may open a support ticket for technical questions.  
  
**Q: Do you have a looking glass and testfiles available?**  
**Looking Glass:** http://lg-dro.liteserver.nl  
**Test IPv4:** 185.31.172.235  
**Test IPv6:** 2a01:6340:1:20:3::10  
**Testfiles:** http://testfiles.liteserver.nl  
  
**Q: Which network are you using?**  
We operate our own network AS60404.
